ComicInfo.Summary:
Mission Impossible meets Grimm Fairy Tales in this new intense spy mini-series from Zenescope!
Red Agent teams with a witch named Avril Williams and a hacker unlike any she's ever known to infiltrate an extremely dangerous organization.
Don't miss this brand new Grimm Universe spy series from Zenescope!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Edgar Salazar & Erick Arciniega | 1 | B | Cover B | Caio Cacau | 2 | C | Cover C | Michael Dooney & Ivan Nunes | 3 | D | Cover D | Diego Galindo & Grostieta | 4 | E | London Super Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Sabine Rich | 5 |
